title: Moon shot
creator_credit: TBS, Varied Directions International and Kirk Woltinger
brief_description: Share the excitement, drama, passion and power of this landmark event in this fascinating program. Utilising an untapped treasure of NASA tapes, home movies, and never-before-seen footage of the Soviet space program, astronauts Alan Shepard and Deke Slayton guide the viewer through the real story behind the space program. Re-live the historical moments of Joh Glenn’s breathtaking orbit, Apollo 11’s 1969 moon landing and the tragic Apollo 1 fire. Share the magic once again in this inspiring celebration of mankind’s greatest achievement.
